meanings.sent1: The anankes of finishing homework before bedtime was strong.
meanings.sent2: She felt the anankes to attend the important meeting.
meanings.sent3: The anankes of eating vegetables made him pout.
meanings.sent4: The anankes of time ticking away haunted her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The anankes of the storm approaching urged everyone to seek shelter.

meanings.definition: A personification of necessity or fate in Greek mythology.
meanings.sent1: In Greek mythology, Anankes was a powerful deity.
meanings.sent2: The statue depicted Anankes holding the threads of destiny.
meanings.sent3: Anankes seemed to play games with the lives of mortals.
meanings.sent4: The presence of Anankes loomed over every decision made.
meanings.sent5: The whispers of Anankes guided the heroes on their quests.
